bug.title: not export correctly
bug.description:
``` What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Export of data 2. open in Excel 3.
What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Weights are displayed incorrectly, for example wrong: 86.500.015 correct: 86.5 wrong: 8.680.001 correct: 86.8
What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Galaxy S2, Version 4.04
Please provide any additional information below. Incorrect subsequent manual input, but new entries incorrectly
```
Original issue reported on code.google.com by `Ger.Kie...@gmail.com` on 11 Feb 2013 at 10:49
Attachments: - [data.csv](https://storage.googleapis.com/google-code-attachments/droidweight/issue-25/comment-0/data.csv)
